name: That Weird Zoo Game
description:
Made in 48 hours for Game Plus Jam 2022

Theme: Mix It Up

Synopsis

The animals are having a hard time adjusting to their new biology... Find the right body part to satisfy their needs.

You can drag and drop parts from other animals, take parts off to move them. Hover over any animal part and more information will appear at the bottom of the screen.

Animals need at least 2 body parts from their chosen food preference. So, a vegetarian animal needs parts from 2 vegetarian animals to be happy etc.

We hope you can save the zoo!

Controls

  • Left mouse click to drag body parts around.
  • Zoom in and out with middle mouse button.
  • Left mouse click on the background and drag to move the view.

Tips

  • There are 12 animals to save! Keep an eye out for red text (it means something is wrong with that animal!) and use the arrows that appear around the edges of the screen to help you find the animals (or just use the middle scroll wheel to zoom out!).

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/chill-jungle-ambient
